name: Depths of Insanity 2
description:
This is a sequel to the game: Depths of Insanity


https://store.steampowered.com/app/2310590/Depths_of_Insanity/

Listen to almost all the Artists from the game series from the link in the game's credits folder
---It's a Dark Cartoony Shooter/Adventure/RPG
Explore, uncover secrets, find cool & weird weapons, Rescue a friend in big trouble!

Depths of Insanity 2
